text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump 40,000 dead Americans today from COVID-19.

40,000 dead Americans today from COVID-19.

40,000 dead Americans today from COVID-19.

And you said that COVID-19 would never come to America under his watch.

You and Trump are dishonest and incompetent and malevolent.
